Class Producer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • imageprocessing.ProducerConsumer
        • imageprocessing.Producer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProducerConsumerInterface, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Producer
extends ProducerConsumer
    Concrete class that extends ProducerConsumer It is used for rading an image as a byte array and storing it into a buffer
    Author:
    Constantin Gheorghe
